title: Have Fun. Be Safe.
author: Carnival Cruise Line
description: Get all the details on Carnival's guidelines for a fun and safe cruise vacation.
cleaned_text: Cruising with Carnival is easy! Vaccines and testing are not required for most U.S. and European departures.* Guests sailing to and from Australia must visit the [Australia Have Fun. Be Safe. page](https://www.carnival.com.au/legal/covid-19-legal-notices) for protocols specific to those cruises. VACCINATION & TESTING Although vaccines are not required, we encourage all guests, 5 years of age and older, to be up to date with their COVID-19 vaccines, when eligible, and carry proof of vaccination. Testing is not required for either vaccinated or unvaccinated guests. However, we encourage all guests, 5 years and older, to take a pre-cruise COVID-19 test within three days of their cruise.
